ai-mil3.1.12:1.3_0: “Great king, this energy isn’t oppressive, great king, when it comes to energy, all skillful qualities don’t decline.”
ai-mil3.1.12:2.2_0: “Great king, suppose a person were to fall a piece of wood from a plant flower, so that it wouldn’t make you fall into such a wood,
ai-mil3.1.12:2.3_0: In the same way, there’s a sign of energy because of this energy, when it comes to developing skillful qualities, non-humans.”
ai-mil3.1.12:3.2_0: “Great king, the kings of coils would consider a large debate to each other with a large amount of rice.
ai-mil3.1.12:3.3_0: In the same way, there are a sign of energy known by the hero, when it comes to decline while skillful qualities grow.
ai-mil3.1.12:3.4_0: I have been spoken by the Buddha, great king, and
ai-mil3.1.12:3.5_0: ‘A noble disciple with energy as their pillar gives up the unskillful and develops the skillful,
ai-mil3.1.12:3.6_0: the blameworthy and the blameless, and the blameless.
ai-mil3.1.12:5.1_0: The twelfth for energy and vigorous,
